data.title: Horizons Academy
data.text:
We are a Christian microschool located near Aurora, WV, providing an alternative to public school. Our goal is to create a safe and nurturing environment where students can grow academically and spiritually. We believe that education is not only about gaining knowledge, but also about fostering character and values. At Horizons Academy, we strive to instill in our students a love for learning, a sense of purpose, and a strong moral compass.

Join us on this exciting journey!

Our Core Values:

Faith-Centered Education: We integrate Christian values into every aspect of our school day, helping students grow spiritually while excelling academically.

Individualized Attention: We focus on each student's unique needs, fostering a supportive and personalized learning experience, and create a personalized learning goal for every student.

Academic Excellence: Our dedicated educators are committed to delivering a rigorous academic program that prepares students for a bright future.

Community and Service: We encourage our students to serve others and be active members of their community, instilling a sense of responsibility and empathy.

Enroll your child at Horizons Academy and provide them with an education that will empower them to thrive academically and spiritually. We welcome families who share our values and are committed to helping their children grow in faith and knowledge.
